     src="https://img.shields.io/badge/üèÜ_BEST_PAPER_AWARD_üèÜ-yellow?style=flat-square"
     alt="Best paper award badge">

- **Yildiz, H. U.**, & Tavli, B. (2015, December). Prolonging wireless sensor network lifetime by optimal utilization of compressive sensing. In *2015 IEEE Globecom Workshops (GC Wkshps)* (pp. 1‚Äì6). IEEE.  
![Conference](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Conference-lightgrey?style=flat-square) [![DOI](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-Available-blue?style=flat-square)](https://doi.org/10.1109/GLOCOMW.2015.7414049) [![PDF](https://img.shields.io/badge/PDF-Download-red?style=flat-square)](/files/papers/conference/international/yildiz2015prolonging.pdf) [![Slides](https://img.shields.io/badge/Slides-Available-orange?style=flat-square)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/16r6UKYnylhsZX8nenBAxjtg5uCnpTa52/view?usp=sharing)  

- **Yildiz, H. U.**, & Tavli, B. (2014, December). The impact of random power assignment in handshaking on wireless sensor network lifetime. In *2014 IEEE Globecom Workshops (GC Wkshps)* (pp. 201‚Äì206). IEEE.  
![Conference](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Conference-lightgrey?style=flat-square) [![DOI](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-Available-blue?style=flat-square)](https://doi.org/10.1109/GLOCOMW.2014.7063431) [![PDF](https://img.shields.io/badge/PDF-Download-red?style=flat-square)](/files/papers/conference/international/yildiz2014theimpactrandom.pdf) [![Slides](https://img.shields.io/badge/Slides-Available-orange?style=flat-square)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/16Y3ol-umGpcveJLMhc_pZTuqigtw8fEP/view?usp=sharing)  

- **Yildiz, H. U.**, Kurt, S., & Tavli, B. (2014, October). The impact of near-ground path loss modeling on wireless sensor network lifetime. In *2014 IEEE Military Communications Conference (MILCOM)* (pp. 1114‚Äì1119). IEEE.  
![Conference](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Conference-lightgrey?style=flat-square) [![DOI](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-Available-blue?style=flat-square)](https://doi.org/10.1109/MILCOM.2014.188) [![PDF](https://img.shields.io/badge/PDF-Download-red?style=flat-square)](/files/papers/conference/international/yildiz2014theimpactnear.pdf) [![Slides](https://img.shields.io/badge/Slides-Available-orange?style=flat-square)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15jZn25CaLQMSngx2aH00yvzvtiD3oSy9/view?usp=sharing)  

- Akbas, A., **Yildiz, H. U.**, & Tavli, B. (2014, May). Data packet length optimization for wireless sensor network lifetime maximization. In *2014 10th International Conference on Communications (COMM)* (pp. 1‚Äì6). IEEE.

- **Yildiz, H. U.**, Bicakci, K., & Tavli, B. (2014, January). Communication/computation trade-offs in wireless sensor networks: Comparing network-level and node-level strategies. In *2014 IEEE Topical Conference on Wireless Sensors and Sensor Networks (WiSNet)* (pp. 49‚Äì51). IEEE.

### Conference Papers (National - in Turkish)

![Conference](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Conference-lightgrey?style=flat-square) [![DOI](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-Available-blue?style=flat-square)](https://doi.org/10.1109/SIU.2018.8404252) [![PDF](https://img.shields.io/badge/PDF-Download-red?style=flat-square)](/files/papers/conference/national/karakurt2018impact.pdf) [![Slides](https://img.shields.io/badge/Slides-Available-orange?style=flat-square)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/16XhbRpe_H93KSsPHMIKzp2IgwA8Nz4b8/view?usp=sharing)

- **Yildiz, H. U.**, Tavli, B., & Kahjogh, B. O. (2017, May). Assessment of wireless sensor network lifetime reduction due to elimination of critical node sets. In *2017 25th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU)* (pp. 1‚Äì4). IEEE.  
![Conference](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Conference-lightgrey?style=flat-square) [![DOI](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-Available-blue?style=flat-square)](https://doi.org/10.1109/SIU.2017.7960228) [![PDF](https://img.shields.io/badge/PDF-Download-red?style=flat-square)](/files/papers/conference/national/yildiz2017assessment.pdf) [![Slides](https://img.shields.io/badge/Slides-Available-orange?style=flat-square)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15euPq5RHnGhSFm788StYStlpDJEYPMBA/view?usp=sharing)

<!-- ================================================================
     INLINE SCRIPTS ‚Äî filtre + donut grafikler
     Harici JS dosyasƒ±na baƒüƒ±mlƒ±lƒ±k yok; timing sorunu yok.
     ================================================================ -->
<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {

  /* ‚îÄ‚îÄ Her ≈üeyi DOM hazƒ±r olduktan sonra √ßalƒ±≈ütƒ±r ‚îÄ‚îÄ */
  function onReady(fn) {
    if (document.readyState === "loading") {
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", fn);
    } else {
      fn();
    }
  }

  /* ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
     1. PUBLICATION FILTER
     ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê */
  function initFilter() {
    var allItems = [];

    var headings = {
      "journal"   : document.getElementById("journal-papers"),
      "editorial" : document.getElementById("editorials"),
      "conf-int"  : document.getElementById("conference-papers-international"),
      "conf-nat"  : document.getElementById("conference-papers-national-turkish"),
    };

    /* Her b√∂l√ºm√ºn altƒ±ndaki <ul> i√ßindeki <li>'leri topla */
    for (var type in headings) {
      var heading = headings[type];
      if (!heading) continue;

      var el = heading.nextElementSibling;
      while (el && el.tagName !== "UL" && el.tagName !== "OL") {
        el = el.nextElementSibling;
      }
      if (!el) continue;

      var items = el.getElementsByTagName("li");
      for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
        var item = items[i];
        item.setAttribute("data-type", type);

        /* Yƒ±l √ßƒ±kar: "(2024, November)" veya "(2024)" */
        var text  = item.textContent;
        var match =
          text.match(/\((\d{4}),\s*(?:January|February|March|April|May|June|July|August|September|October|November|December)\)/) ||
          text.match(/\((\d{4})\)/);
        if (match) item.setAttribute("data-year", match[1]);

        allItems.push(item);
      }
    }

    var typeSelect = document.getElementById("pubType");
    var yearSelect = document.getElementById("pubYear");
    var resetBtn   = document.getElementById("pubReset");
    var countDiv   = document.getElementById("pubCount");

    if (!typeSelect || !yearSelect) return;

    /* Yƒ±l dropdown'ƒ±nƒ± doldur */
    var years = {};
    for (var i = 0; i < allItems.length; i++) {
      var y = allItems[i].getAttribute("data-year");
      if (y) years[y] = true;
    }
    Object.keys(years).sort(function (a, b) { return b - a; }).forEach(function (yr) {
      var opt = document.createElement("option");
      opt.value = opt.textContent = yr;
      yearSelect.appendChild(opt);
    });

    /* Filtre uygula */
    function applyFilter() {
      var selType = typeSelect.value;
      var selYear = yearSelect.value;
      var visible = 0;
      var counts  = { journal: 0, editorial: 0, "conf-int": 0, "conf-nat": 0 };

      for (var i = 0; i < allItems.length; i++) {
        var it   = allItems[i];
        var show = (selType === "all" || it.getAttribute("data-type") === selType) &&
                   (selYear === "all" || it.getAttribute("data-year") === selYear);
        it.style.display = show ? "" : "none";
        if (show) { visible++; counts[it.getAttribute("data-type")]++; }
      }

      /* B√∂l√ºm ba≈ülƒ±klarƒ±nƒ± gizle/g√∂ster */
      for (var type in headings) {
        if (headings[type]) {
          headings[type].style.display = counts[type] > 0 ? "" : "none";
        }
      }

      if (countDiv) {
        countDiv.textContent = visible === allItems.length
          ? "Showing all " + allItems.length + " publications"
          : "Showing " + visible + " of " + allItems.length + " publications";
      }
    }

    typeSelect.addEventListener("change", applyFilter);
    yearSelect.addEventListener("change", applyFilter);
    if (resetBtn) {
      resetBtn.addEventListener("click", function () {
        typeSelect.value = yearSelect.value = "all";
        applyFilter();
      });
    }

    applyFilter();
  }

  /* ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
     2. DONUT GRAFƒ∞KLER (saf SVG ‚Äî harici k√ºt√ºphane yok)
     ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê */
  var CHARTS = [
    {
      id     : "pubCountDonut",
      title  : "Publication Count",
      center : "total",
      slices : [
        { label: "Journal Articles",     value: 24, color: "#4e8fc7" },
        { label: "Conf. Papers (Intl.)", value: 13, color: "#f28c28" },
        { label: "Conf. Papers (Nat.)",  value:  5, color: "#5aaa6e" },
        { label: "Editorial",            value:  1, color: "#9b59b6" },
      ],
    },
    {
      id     : "journalQDonut",
      title  : "Journal Quartiles (Q)",
      center : "journals",
      slices : [
        { label: "Q1", value: 20, color: "#c9a227" },
        { label: "Q2", value:  3, color: "#f28c28" },
        { label: "Q3", value:  1, color: "#5aaa6e" },
      ],
    },
  ];

  var NS = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg";

  function svgEl(tag, attrs) {
    var el = document.createElementNS(NS, tag);
    for (var k in attrs) el.setAttribute(k, attrs[k]);
    return el;
  }

  function polar(cx, cy, r, deg) {
    var rad = (deg - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return { x: cx + r * Math.cos(rad), y: cy + r * Math.sin(rad) };
  }

  function arc(cx, cy, r, s, e) {
    if (Math.abs(e - s) >= 360) e = s + 359.9999;
    var a = polar(cx, cy, r, s), b = polar(cx, cy, r, e);
    return "M " + a.x + " " + a.y + " A " + r + " " + r + " 0 " + (e - s > 180 ? 1 : 0) + " 1 " + b.x + " " + b.y;
  }

  function buildDonut(cfg) {
    var wrap = document.getElementById(cfg.id);
    if (!wrap) return;

    var total = cfg.slices.reduce(function (s, d) { return s + d.value; }, 0);

    wrap.innerHTML = "";
    wrap.style.display = "";

    /* Ba≈ülƒ±k ‚Äî CSS: .pub-chart__title */
    var h = document.createElement("h3");
    h.className   = "pub-chart__title";
    h.textContent = cfg.title;
    wrap.appendChild(h);

    /* Wrapper div ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-wrap (grid, tek s√ºtun) */
    var wrapInner = document.createElement("div");
    wrapInner.className = "qdonut-wrap";
    wrap.appendChild(wrapInner);

    /* ‚îÄ‚îÄ SVG ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-svg ‚îÄ‚îÄ */
    var S = 220, CX = 110, CY = 110, RO = 90, RI = 54;
    var svg = svgEl("svg", {
      viewBox : "0 0 " + S + " " + S,
      class   : "qdonut-svg",
      role    : "img",
    });

    /* Delik (hole) ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-hole */
    svg.appendChild(svgEl("circle", {
      cx: CX, cy: CY, r: RI,
      class: "qdonut-hole",
    }));

    var start = 0;
    cfg.slices.forEach(function (sl) {
      var sweep = sl.value / total * 360;

      /* Dilim */
      var path = svgEl("path", {
        d             : arc(CX, CY, (RO + RI) / 2, start, start + sweep),
        stroke        : sl.color,
        "stroke-width": RO - RI,
        fill          : "none",
      });
      svg.appendChild(path);

      /* Dilim √ºst√ºne sayƒ± ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-count */
      if (sl.value / total > 0.06) {
        var mp  = polar(CX, CY, (RO + RI) / 2, start + sweep / 2);
        var lbl = svgEl("text", {
          x: mp.x, y: mp.y,
          "text-anchor"       : "middle",
          "dominant-baseline" : "central",
          class               : "qdonut-count",
        });
        lbl.textContent = sl.value;
        svg.appendChild(lbl);
      }

      start += sweep;
    });

    /* Merkez total ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-total / .qdonut-sub */
    var cNum = svgEl("text", {
      x: CX, y: CY - 12,
      "text-anchor"       : "middle",
      "dominant-baseline" : "central",
      class               : "qdonut-total",
    });
    cNum.textContent = total;
    svg.appendChild(cNum);

    var cSub = svgEl("text", {
      x: CX, y: CY + 16,
      "text-anchor"       : "middle",
      "dominant-baseline" : "central",
      class               : "qdonut-sub",
    });
    cSub.textContent = cfg.center;
    svg.appendChild(cSub);

    wrapInner.appendChild(svg);

    /* ‚îÄ‚îÄ Legend ‚Äî CSS: .qdonut-legend / .qdonut-legend__row / .qdonut-legend__swatch ‚îÄ‚îÄ */
    var legend = document.createElement("div");
    legend.className = "qdonut-legend";

    cfg.slices.forEach(function (sl) {
      var row = document.createElement("div");
      row.className = "qdonut-legend__row";

      var sw = document.createElement("span");
      sw.className        = "qdonut-legend__swatch";
      sw.style.background = sl.color;

      var lbl = document.createElement("span");
      lbl.textContent = sl.label + " (" + sl.value + ")";

      row.appendChild(sw);
      row.appendChild(lbl);
      legend.appendChild(row);
    });

    wrapInner.appendChild(legend);
  }

  /* ‚îÄ‚îÄ Ba≈ülat ‚îÄ‚îÄ */
  onReady(function () {
    initFilter();
    CHARTS.forEach(buildDonut);

    /* .pub-donuts-2col grid container'ƒ± g√∂ster (display:none ile ba≈ülƒ±yor) */
    var dc = document.querySelector(".pub-donuts-2col");
    if (dc) dc.style.display = "";
  });

})();
</script>
